mapper.select: /* cstm.getCstmList 고객 리스트 조회 */ SELECT B.BUYER_ID , B.BUYER_NM ,'DB경로' AS DB , DECODE( NVL( C.BUYER_ID ,'NO') , 'NO', '' ,'진행중' ) AS PROCESS_STATUS , B.TEL , B.ADDR , B.COMPANY_REGNUM , TO_CHAR(C.CONTACT_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CONTACT_DATE /* 상담일 */ , TO_CHAR(C.CONTRACT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CONTRACT_DATE /* 자문계약일 */ , NVL( C.CONSULTING_COST, '-') AS CONSULTING_COST /* 자문료 */ , TO_CHAR(C.EXPIRE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPIRE_DATE /* 만료일 */ , GET_USER_NM(C.USER_ID) AS CONTRACT_USER_NM /* 담당자*/ , 'SUB담당자1' AS SUB1_USER_NM , 'SUB담당자2' AS SUB2_USER_NM , NVL( C.LAST_SOLUTION, '-') AS LAST_SOLUTION /* 최종솔루션 */ , C.TAX_MNG /* 세무담당 */ , C.LABOR_MNG /* 노무담당 */ , C.TOTAL_COST , C.USER_ID /* 담당자 */ , C.CONTRACT_TYPE , C.CONTRACT_ID , C.CONSULTING_ID, C.PROCESS_STATE FROM TBL_EXP_BUYER B ,TBL_EXP_CONTRACT C WHERE B.BUYER_ID = C.BUYER_ID(+) AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: /* cstm.updateCstm 고객 저장 */ MERGE INTO TBL_EXP_BUYER T USING ( SELECT #{BUYER_ID} AS BUYER_ID, #{BUYER_NM} AS BUYER_NM, #{TEL} AS TEL, #{ADDR} AS ADDR, #{COMPANY_REGNUM} AS COMPANY_REGNUM FROM dual ) S ON (T.BUYER_ID = S.BUYER_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.BUYER_NM = S.BUYER_NM, T.TEL = S.TEL, T.ADDR = S.ADDR, T.COMPANY_REGNUM = S.COMPANY_REGNUM WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( BUYER_ID, BUYER_NM, TEL, ADDR, COMPANY_REGNUM ) VALUES ( S.BUYER_ID, S.BUYER_NM, S.TEL, S.ADDR, S.COMPANY_REGNUM )
mapper.delete: /* cstm.deleteCstm 고객 삭제 */ UPDATE TBL_EXP_BUYER SET USE_YN = 'N' , DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID}
